FAQ

1: What is itemized estimate?

Answer: Itemized estimate is a list of work which is to be done at your site, so that you can compare the rates and remove selected or unnecessary items, if not required.

2: Do I have to give a list of requirements?

Answer: Yes, you have to provide us your requirements which is to be done at your site so we can provide you an actual estimate.

3: In how much time I receive my free estimate?

Answer: We mostly provide the estimate on same day or next day, but sometimes we need more details from you, for that our team will contact you & clear all doubts to prepare the estimate.

4: Estimate includes all labour & material cost?

Answer: Yes both.

5: Do you provide labour charges only?

Answer: Yes, we provide labour cost also but it differs from city to city. Call us on +91-9930930964.

6: Do you provide loan EMI options ?

Answer: Yes, we provide easy loan EMI options, for more details Call us on +91-9930930964.

7: What if I don’t know how to give my the exact requirements?

Answer: Don’t worry, just call us and we will collect the proper requirements over the phone.
